subject: College Athletics
Soccer
lead_paragraph: After winning two consecutive penalty-kick shootouts to advance to the N.C.A.A. Division III national semifinals, Stevens Tech of Hoboken, N.J., found itself on the opposite end — losing by 3-0 in the tie-breaker to Messiah College of Grantham, Pa., in the title game.
